description: At the start of each enemy's turn, there is a 10% chance that your [sorc_sorcerer_spellofroots] Spell of Roots, [sorc_sorcerer_spellofslumber] Spell of Slumber, and [sorc_sorcerer_deepfreeze] Spell of Frost perks will activate. This chance is increased by an additional 10% each turn. After this perk activates, the chance is set back to 10%.
name: Undertow
